response.original_title: Dihh Lopes - O Excelentíssimo Rei Do Humor Pardo
response.overview: After a 4-year hiatus, Dihh Lopes returns to release a comedy special. In this new show, Dihh Lopes presents his evolution as a comedian. A reflective show, in which he brings up his questions as a brown man and what it was like to have a different upbringing from the point of view of his father, a white man, and his mother, a black woman. In addition to "solving" some of society's problems as only a great President could. Celebrating 16 years of career, we have a more mature and in-depth show from one of the main comedians on the Brazilian scene.
response.title: Dihh Lopes - O Excelentíssimo Rei Do Humor Pardo
